kind.description: The type of object represented by the document

image.description: A URI for an OCI image

imagePullPolicy.description: Pull policy for the OCI image

workingDirectory.description: If applicable, specifies the working directory

command.description: The command to execute within the container

arguments.description: Arguments to the command to execute within the container

environment.description: A map of environment variables and their values

workspaceMountPath.description: If applicable, location in the file system where the shared workspace volume should be mounted

sourceMountPath.description: If applicable, location in the file system where source should be mounted

privileged.description: Whether the container wishes to run in privileged mode

useHostDockerSocket.description: Whether the container wishes to mount the host's Docker socket

host.description: Host selection details for a job

os.description: Operating system required on the host to host the job's containers successfully

nodeSelector.descriptions: Labels that must bre present on a host to host the job's containers successfully

primaryContainer.description: Specification for the job's primary container

sidecarContainers.description: Specification for the job's sidecar containers, if any

name.description: The job's name; must be unique per worker
